√ūh1 'remove'

present: [1.] ū́hati V.+  ū́hate V.+  

[perfect: ūhāṃ  cakāra  ]

aorist: [1.] uhyāt  ohi   -- [3.] aujihat   -- [5.] auhīt  

verbal: ūḍha B.+  ūhita  ūhitum E.+  oḍhum E.+  -ūhitavaí  -ūhya B.+  -úhya B.+  -óham  -ū́ham  

secondary: passive: uhyate B.+  ūhyate   -- causative: ūhayati  

derivatives: ūha AV.+  -ūhaka C.  ūhyà B.+  ūhana S.+  ūhanīya S.+  ūhitavya C.  ūḍhi C.  -oha RV.  -oghas? RV.  

Doubtless a differentiated form of √vah, from which in some forms and meanings it is hardly to be separated.
